name: Strong Like Orc LD34
description:
UPDATE: Now with 2-player mode!

Dodge blocks and smash boxes in this endless runner/orc training simulator!

The humans are coming to enslave your (moderately) peaceful tribe of orcs!

Play as an initiate and compete in a training course to train for battle against the unscrupulous humans.

Comment with your top scores!

Additional credits:
Sound effects - sfxr
Background - http://ansimuz.com/site/archives/807
Bricks - http://opengameart.org/content/bricks-0
Music 1 - http://opengameart.org/content/taiko-drums-seamles...
Music 2 - http://opengameart.org/content/factory-ambiance
